<a name="details" id="details"></a><h2 class="groupheader">Detailed Description</h2>
<div class="textblock"><p>An analog input, used for reading the voltage on a pin. </p>
<p>Synchronization level: Thread safe</p>
<p>Example: </p><div class="fragment"><div class="line"><span class="comment">// Print messages when the AnalogIn is greater than 50%</span></div>
<div class="line"></div>
<div class="line"><span class="preprocessor">#include &quot;mbed.h&quot;</span></div>
<div class="line"></div>
<div class="line"><a class="code" href="group__drivers.html#ga3504d43564933da5b952c0f4deefb874">AnalogIn</a> temperature(p20);</div>
<div class="line"></div>
<div class="line"><span class="keywordtype">int</span> main() {</div>
<div class="line">    <span class="keywordflow">while</span>(1) {</div>
<div class="line">        <span class="keywordflow">if</span>(temperature &gt; 0.5) {</div>
<div class="line">            printf(<span class="stringliteral">&quot;Too hot! (%f)&quot;</span>, temperature.read());</div>
<div class="line">        }</div>
<div class="line">    }</div>
<div class="line">}</div>
</div><!-- fragment --> 
<p>Definition at line <a class="el" href="AnalogIn_8h_source.html#l00052">52</a> of file <a class="el" href="AnalogIn_8h_source.html">AnalogIn.h</a>.</p>
</div></div><!-- contents -->

<a name="details" id="details"></a><h2 class="groupheader">Detailed Description</h2>
<div class="textblock"><p>An analog output, used for setting the voltage on a pin. </p>
<p>Synchronization level: Thread safe</p>
<p>Example: </p><div class="fragment"><div class="line"><span class="comment">// Make a sawtooth output</span></div>
<div class="line"></div>
<div class="line"><span class="preprocessor">#include &quot;mbed.h&quot;</span></div>
<div class="line"></div>
<div class="line"><a class="code" href="group__drivers.html#ga32d877265c2bc3c90bbccf398c281f97">AnalogOut</a> tri(p18);</div>
<div class="line"><span class="keywordtype">int</span> main() {</div>
<div class="line">    <span class="keywordflow">while</span>(1) {</div>
<div class="line">        tri = tri + 0.01;</div>
<div class="line">        wait_us(1);</div>
<div class="line">        <span class="keywordflow">if</span>(tri == 1) {</div>
<div class="line">            tri = 0;</div>
<div class="line">        }</div>
<div class="line">    }</div>
<div class="line">}</div>
</div><!-- fragment --> 
<p>Definition at line <a class="el" href="AnalogOut_8h_source.html#l00052">52</a> of file <a class="el" href="AnalogOut_8h_source.html">AnalogOut.h</a>.</p>
</div></div><!-- contents -->
